title: Pre-Season
body: I'm a {{champion:7}}  main, and considering she's getting reworked as part of the Assassin Rework and it looks interesting, I wanna know: When is the pre-season patch (6.22) coming out on live servers?

replies.body: Just over two weeks from now is the current plan.
Any hints on what else you might Meddle with on the PBE...
From memory all the major content changes planned are on there already, so at this point it'll be more about polish and adjustments as needed than anything really new.
WAIT; WHY ARE YOU ONLY PLATINUM!?  THIS IS NOT RIGHT.  YOU ME RANK NOW. DIAMOND MUST WE BE.

Because I'm a good enough player to get to Plat, but not a good enough player to get to Diamond.

Thanks for the duo offer, but I'm an almost entirely solo ranked player.
What makes you enjoy playing brand so much?

I tend to go through phases of trying a champ I haven't played much for a good 30 or so games. Right now that's support Brand (Nami, Leona, support Sion, top Yorick being the other recent ish champs). Decided to give the Brand thing another go after seeing Likkrit play it recently and remembered that I'd enjoyed Brand mid a fair bit back in the day. So far really digging it bot lane.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=njl3IWa2,comment-id=0002000000000002000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-23T03:08:15.073+0000)
>
> I tend to go through phases of trying a champ I haven't played much for a good 30 or so games. Right now that's support Brand (Nami, Leona, support Sion, top Yorick being the other recent ish champs). Decided to give the Brand thing another go after seeing Likkrit play it recently and remembered that I'd enjoyed Brand mid a fair bit back in the day. So far really digging it bot lane.

Support Leona? You should try her top sometime :3

Sounds pretty cool, i do the same thing. 
I went from getting nidalee to mastery 4 then waiting a while, then getting her to mastery 7 in about 2 days. 
Right now im focusing on warden supports like braum, thresh, and taric.

Have you considered the Maokaiser {{champion:57}} {{champion:82}}  bottom lane?
Both get Bond of Stone, both get Relic Shield, both have sustain and tankiness in their kits (and Maokai gives them both even more tankiness with his ult), and now with Knight's Vow they can tank and spank even harder.

It's a match made in heaven I tell you.

> tank and spank

thank you for giving me this term to use.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=njl3IWa2,comment-id=00020000000000020000,timestamp=2016-10-23T01:43:08.475+0000)
>
> Because I'm a good enough player to get to Plat, but not a good enough player to get to Diamond.
> 
> Thanks for the duo offer, but I'm an almost entirely solo ranked player.

Sorry about being a cock and making you dodge one day....

I bet your janna is really good and i hope i get the priveledge of joining you again in a game

Love the humble-ness.

If you were looking for a duo, thats something id look for in a teammate :).
Can the Resolve tree be tweaked a bit though?
do you think LeBlanc's lategame is a bit weak with a 1.5 delay on her passive? Every assassin bursts faster than her during that phase, in my opinion it should scale down to at least a second :/
lol I main LeBlanc. And her late game was always slighty weak.

yeah me too. But actually her power curve increased after the 40 minute mark because of her q+r oneshot, which has no counterplay, but the pbe LeBlanc is... she has a lot of damage, yeah, but it is not easy to kill an adc with lifesteal, not even with usage of her clone. Before the damage applies, the adc can kill both.
The current set of PBE changes is going to be there for 3 weeks (as opposed to the usual 2)
A long time based on what the PBE is right now. Games crash left and right, Braum is invis, and we are duping Dirks.
